statement.title: Accessibility Statement
statement.intro: is committed to making its digital services accessible, in accordance with Article 47 of Law No. 2005-102 of February 11, 2005.
statement.appliesTo: This accessibility statement applies to the website:
statement.complianceText: is {{status}} with the General Framework for Improving Accessibility (RGAA), due to the non-compliances and exemptions listed below.
statement.testResultsIntro: The compliance audit carried out by {{auditor}} on {{date}} reveals that:
statement.testEnvironmentIntro: Content rendering verifications were performed with the following combinations:
statement.contactIntro: If you are unable to access content or a service, you can contact the person responsible for {{siteName}} to be directed to an accessible alternative or obtain the content in another form.
statement.appealIntro: If you notice an accessibility defect preventing you from accessing content or functionality of the site, that you report it to us and you do not receive a response from us, you have the right to send your complaints or a referral request to the Defender of Rights.
statement.appealMethods: Several options are available to you:
statement.appealOption2: Contact the ambassador of the Defender of Rights in your region
statement.appealOption3: Send a letter by mail (free, no stamp required):
statement.appealAddress:
Defender of Rights
Free response 71120
75342 Paris CEDEX 07
